snippet: Employment in manufacturing jobs rose in 2010 and 2011, and manufactured exports also rose. A monthly survey of manufacturers shows more were hiring than firing for 27 consecutive months, the third-longest string since the survey began in 1948.
lead_paragraph: Employment in manufacturing jobs rose in 2010 and 2011, and manufactured exports also rose. A monthly survey of manufacturers shows more were hiring than firing for 27 consecutive months, the third-longest string since the survey began in 1948.
